name: Sacchariine Demo
description:
This is a passion project of mine dating back several years. It is an homage to early RPG Maker horror games like OFF and Yume Nikki, but with a stronger emphasis on creative combat and storytelling. It is made almost entirely by myself in RPG Maker VX Ace.

--

Sugar is a girl with extraordinary abilities, being able to see things from the Other World that lies just beyond our own. But when she becomes ensnared in the sinister designs of demons, she must protect her and her mother from threats unimaginable. But like the descent of Dante, lurking at the end of her journey beckons Treachery...

--

This download is only a demo of the first chapter of the game and is approximately 0.5-1 hours. I hope the full game to be close to 4-5 hours
